alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 6:53PM EDT until September 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Northeastern Franklin County in western Massachusetts... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 652 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Northfield, or 8 miles northwest of Orange, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Northfield, Bernardston, Erving, Gill, Royalston and Warwick. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
